title: 1st Shuttle Force Smash Cup
description:
What a better way to start the year? 
Kick off 2026 with power, passion, and a whole lot of smashing action!
Introducing Shuttle Force - Powered by Goodminton Smash Zone, our very first Shuttle Smash Cup happening on January 18, 2026 at Goodminton Smash Zone, Pasig City!
Whether youâ€™re leveling up your game, testing your skills, or simply ready to have fun with the community, this tournament is the perfect way to spark your competitive spirit this new year.

âœ¨ CATEGORIES (Non-Gender Doubles): 
â€¢ Level B - Advanced 
â€¢ Level C - High Intermediate 
â€¢ Level D - Low Intermediate 
â€¢ Level E - High Beginner

ğŸ’° Cash Prizes for Champions: 
â€¢ Level B - â‚±5,000 
â€¢ Level C - â‚±4,000 
â€¢ Level D - â‚±3,000 
â€¢ Level E - â‚±2,000
Plus â‚±1,000 for 1st runner-up and medals for all awardees!

ğŸ½ Tournament Inclusions: 
Jersey, awards, cash prizes, shuttlecock, and court fee.

ğŸ’¸ Entry Fee: â‚±1100 
Second entry: â‚±800

ğŸ“Œ IMPORTANT REMINDER: 
Participants should have at least played at Goodminton Smash Zone. If youâ€™re unsure of your level, message us and weâ€™ll assist you.
ğŸ“† Deadline of Registration: January 7, 2026
This is your moment to serve strong, smash harder, and start the year with energy that sets the tone for 2026. Donâ€™t miss it!
For inquiries, message the Goodminton Smash Zone FB page or contact 0917 512 1809.
Letâ€™s bring the FORCE to the court!
#ShuttleForce #GoodmintonSmashZone #StartTheYearStrong #BadmintonPH #maketimeforgoodthings #PasigBadminton

ğŸ¥‡Php 3000 and Medal for Champion 
ğŸ¥ˆMedal for Runner up

Game Rules and Guidelines: 
1. Umpire's decision is final 
2. Honesty policy in end line. 
3. Game Scoring: 1 - 35, change court at 18, No deuce. 
4. Each game has 5 minutes defaulting time. Each pair will be called thrice. An injured player automatically defaults a game. 
5. Single round robin. Each pair will be ranked according to the number of wins. 
6. The pair with the highest number of wins will be declared as Champion. Top 2 will be declared as runner up. 
7. Levels with: 
2 Brackets - top 1 per bracket will play for finals 
3 brackets - top 1 per bracket will draw who will play for semis, and 1 waiting for finals 
4 brackets - top 1 per bracket will play for semis. Winners from semis will play for finals 
8. In cases of tie, the pair with the highest total score will be declared as Champion.  
9. On-site / last-minute registration will not be accommodated. 
10. We will use ling mei 10 as an official shuttlecock  
11. Max of 2 entries per head. 
12. Non payment of registration, automatically cancels your entries.  
13. Deadline of registration and payment is on ğ—ğ—®ğ—» ğŸ®ğŸµ, ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ®ğŸ²
